Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Vase
Description: Small biconical vase with a rounded base. A bead underscores the lip. A section of the body and of the lip is missing. In the uppermost part of the body, just below the lip, are five perforations allowing for the suspension of the vessel.
